SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.collectables

Class Item

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.collectables.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
NorthStar, PurchasableItem, SpecialKey, Weapon
public abstract class Item extends Object
An abstract class representing an item in the game
All items have a weight, and can be picked up by the player
Some items can be purchased, and some can be consumed to provide benefits to the player
See Also:
  • Weapon
  • PurchasableItem
  • ConsumableItem

  • Field Details

    • weight

      protected double weight
      The weight of the item. The player has a limited carrying capacity, reached which they can no longer pick up items.

    • id

      protected int id

    • dropChance

      protected double dropChance
      The chance that the item will be dropped by a mob upon defeat.
